verses.1: Tua ciangin Jakob in a khualzinna zom a, nisuahna lam miteʼ gam a tung hi.
verses.2: A khuadak leh gamlak ah tuikhuk khat a mu hi. Tua gei ah tuu hon thum na lum hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua tuikhuk panin tuuhonte tui kipia hi. Tuikhuk gong hukna suang lian hi.
verses.3: Tua lai munah tuuhonte khempeuh a kikaihkhop khit ciangin, tuucingte in tuikhuk gong panin a suang khuk khia uh a, tuute tui pia-in, tuikhuk gong ama omna ngei ah a suang koihkik uh hi.
verses.4: Jakob in amaute kiangah, “Sanggamte aw, koi pan a hong pai na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi. Amaute in, “Haran pan hi ung,” ci uh hi.
verses.5: Amah in amaute kiangah, “Nahorʼ tapa Laban na thei uh hiam?” a ci hi. Amaute in, “Thei mah ung,” a ci uh hi.
verses.6: Amah in amaute kiangah, “Amah a cidam hiam?” a ci hi. Amaute in, “Dam hi; en in, a tanu Rachel zong a tuu hon tawh hong pai!” a ci uh hi.
verses.7: Amah in, “En un, ni sang lai a, gan kaihkhop hun nai lo hi. Tuute tui pia unla, pai-in an nesak lai un,” a ci hi.
verses.8: Ahih hangin amaute in, “Tuute kikaikhawm a, tuikhuk gong panin a suang a kikhukkhiat mateng tui ka pia thei kei uh hi. A kikhukkhiat khit ciang bekin tuute tui ka pia thei pan uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
verses.9: Tua bangin amaute tawh a kiho laitakin, Rachel a paʼ tuute tawh hong tung hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in tuate kem hi.
verses.10: Tu-in Jakob in a nuʼ sanggampa Labanʼ tanu Rachel le a nuʼ sanggampa Labanʼ tuute a muh ciangin pai to-in tuikhuk gong panin a suang khuk khia a, a nuʼ sanggampa Labanʼ tuute tui a pia hi.
verses.11: Tua ciangin Jakob in Rachel nam a, a gingin kap khia hi.
verses.12: Jakob in Rachelʼ kiangah amah pen a paʼ behte hi a, Rebekahʼ tapa ahihna zong a kigen hi. Tua ciangin Rachel tai-in a paʼ kiangah a gen hi.
verses.13: Laban in a sanggamnuʼ tapa Jakobʼ thu a zak ciangin amah a dawn dingin hong tai a, amah kawi-in nam a, a inn ah a ciahpih hi. Jakob in Labanʼ tungah a thute khempeuh gen a,
verses.14: Laban in ama kiangah, “Nang pen keima si keima sa na hi takpi hi,” a ci hi. Tua hi a, amah tawh kha khat a om khawm hi.
verses.15: Tua ciangin Laban in Jakobʼ kiangah, “Nang pen keima beh na hih ciangin, a man nei lopi-in keiʼ na hong sem ding na hi hiam? Hong gen in; na thaman ding bang hi ding hiam?” a ci hi.
verses.16: Tu-in Laban in tanu nih nei hi. A u zawʼ min Leah hi a, a nau zawʼ min Rachel ahi hi.
verses.17: Leahʼ mit hah nem a, ahih hangin Rachel melhoihin ngaihbaang hi.
verses.18: Jakob in Rachel ngai hi. Amah in, “Na tanu a nau zaw Rachel thalawh nadingin nangma na kum sagih kong sem ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.19: Laban in, “Midang tungah amah ka piak ding sangin nangʼ tungah amah kong piak ding hoih zaw hi; kei kiangah om in,” a ci hi.
verses.20: Tua ahih ciangin Jakob in Rachel a ngah nadingin kum sagih sung na sem a, amah a itna hangin tua hunte ni tawmno khat tawh kibang a sa hi.
verses.21: Tua ciangin Jakob in Laban kiangah, “Ka hun cing ta ahih ciangin amah tawh ka lup khop theih nadingin ka zi hong pia in,” a ci hi.
verses.22: Tua ahih ciangin Laban in tua mun a mi khempeuh kaikhawmin pawi khat a bawl hi.
verses.23: Ahih hangin a nitak ciangin amah in a tanu Leah la-in Jakob kiangah paipih hi. Amah in tua nu luppih hi.
verses.24: (Laban in ama numei nasem Zilpah a tanu Leah tungah a nasem numei dingin a pia hi.)
verses.25: A zingsang ciangin, Leah na hi mawk hi. Jakob in Laban kiangah, “Bangci a kei hong hici bawl na hi hiam? Rachel ngah nadingin na na hong sem hi lo ka hi hiam? Tua ahihleh bang hangin kei hong khem na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
verses.26: Laban in, “A uʼ ma-in a nau zaw piak ding koʼ gamah ngeina hi lo hi.
verses.27: Hih nu adingin nipikal khat sung pawi beisak phot inla, a dang kum sagih ka na nong sepsak thamanin a khat pen zong kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.28: Jakob zong tua bangmahin gamta a, tua nuʼ pawi hunsung beisak phot hi. Tua ciangin Laban in a tanu Rachel zong a zi dingin a pia hi.
verses.29: (Laban in ama nasem numei Bilhah a tanu Rachelʼ tungah a nasem numei dingin a pia hi.)
verses.30: Tua ahih ciangin Jakob in Rachel zong luppih a, amah in Leah sangin Rachel it zaw hi. Labanʼ na a dang kum sagih sung a sem lai hi.
verses.31: Topa in Leah a kimuhdahna a theih ciangin, amah in a naubu honsak hi; ahih hangin Rachel ciing hi.
verses.32: Leah gai-in tapa khat nei a, amah in a min Reuben a phuak hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, “ Topa in ka thuakna hong mu zo hi; tu-in ka pasal in kei hong it taktak ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.33: Amah gaikikin tapa khat nei a, amah in, “Keimah hong kimuhdahna thu Topa in za khin ahih manin, amah in hih tapa zong hong pia hi,” ci hi. Amah in a min Simeon a phuak hi.
verses.34: Amah gai leuleu-in tapa khat nei a, “Amah tawh tapa thum nei ta ka hih manin tu-in ka pasal in kei hong pawl ding hi,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin ama min Levi a phuak hi.
verses.35: Amah gai leuleu-in tapa khat nei a, “Tuhunin Topa ka phat ding hi,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in a min Judah a phuak hi. Tua ciangin a ta neih a tawp hi.
